roleset.name: pay tithe, usually 1/10th of one's income
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: give money
example.text: Local broadcasters should tithe one tenth of the income that they get from these ads.
example.arg: one tenth of the income that they get from these ads.
